section.title: Release 1.1.2.1
section.p: Release 1.1.2.1 fixed one bug: the build process failed with the "Ant all" parameter, which prevented users from running the installation verification tests.

section.title: Release 1.1.2
section.p: Release 1.1.2 was a maintenance release with 14 bug fixes, minor changes to some Ant parameters, support for additional Java parameters, and minor changes to the organization of the doc directory.

section.title: Release 1.1.1
section.p: Release 1.1.1 was a maintenance release with 11 bug fixes and a dost1.0.jar name change back to dost.jar.

section.title: Release 1.1
section.p: Release 1.1 was a major release to add new and improved functionality, fulfill new requirements, and fix bugs.

p.b: New and enhanced features in release 1.1

li.p: Support was added for the OASIS DITA 1.0 standard for DITA DTDs and schemas.
Support was added for transformation to the troff document processing system.

Support was added for XML catalogs, which are logical structures containing mapping information between public IDs and URLs of DTD files. A catalog entry can be used to locate a unified resource identifier (URI) reference for a DTD file. An external entity's public identifier is used for mapping to the URI reference. The URI of any system identifier can be ignored.
The href attribute of the topicref entity was extended to quote a nested topic in a DITA file.
Support was added to support DITA content in 20 languages, and translation of DITA keywords in the same 20 languages.
Accessibility partially applied to XHTML and PDF transformations.
Release 1.1 supported the Eclipse Content Provider.

li.b: Index information in HTML Help and JavaHelp
li.p: Index information now appears in HTML Help and JavaHelp.
The mapref element (a specialization of the topicref element) was added to allow a reference to another ditamap file.
Tables of contents could be generated for Eclipse help.
Support was added for helpsets in JavaHelp.

li.b: Additional parameter support for Java commands
li.p: Support was added for the following Java command parameters: /indexshot, /outext, /copycss, /xsl, and /tempdir.

li.b: Additional parameter support for Ant scripts
li.p: Support was added for the following Ant command parameters: .args.indexshow, args.outext, args.copycss, args.xsl, and dita.temp.dir.
